When this creature enters, seize The Core. [i](Get {E} or surveil 1. A player with the core seizes it at their upkeep. Unblocked creatures seize the core.)[/i]

flavor_text: [i]The Ampryn League maintains a tight grip on the lives of their agents. Unfocused talent invariably becomes unrealized potential.[/i]
